about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: If you are facing a green traffic light but the intersection ahead is blocked by traffic, you should:

about.name: If you are facing a green traffic light but the intersection ahead is blocked by traffic, you should:

hasPart.assesses: If you are facing a green traffic light but the intersection ahead is blocked by traffic, you should: | If you are facing a green traffic light but the intersection ahead is blocked by traffic, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Even if you are facing a green traffic light, do not start across the intersection if there are other vehicles blocking your way. If you are caught in the intersection when the light changes to red, your vehicle will block cross traffic. You can get a ticket for blocking an intersection.

suggestedAnswer.text: Turn left and find another route.

comment.text: Turn left and find another route.

suggestedAnswer.text: Stay out of the intersection until traffic clears.

comment.text: Stay out of the intersection until traffic clears.

suggestedAnswer.text: Follow the other vehicles and enter the intersection.

comment.text: Follow the other vehicles and enter the intersection.

acceptedAnswer.text: Stay out of the intersection until traffic clears.

comment.text: Stay out of the intersection until traffic clears.

answerExplanation.text: Even if you are facing a green traffic light, do not start across the intersection if there are other vehicles blocking your way. If you are caught in the intersection when the light changes to red, your vehicle will block cross traffic. You can get a ticket for blocking an intersection.

comment.text: If you are facing a green traffic light but the intersection ahead is blocked by traffic, you should: | Even if you are facing a green traffic light, do not start across the intersection if there are other vehicles blocking your way. If you are caught in the intersection when the light changes to red, your vehicle will block cross traffic. You can get a ticket for blocking an intersection.

hasPart.name: This road sign means:
hasPart.assesses: This road sign means: | This road sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Warning signs provide notice to road users of a situation that might not be readily apparent and are usually yellow with black markings. This sign warns drivers to be careful when driving under wet conditions as the pavement will become slippery and more difficult to navigate safely.

comment.text: Steep grade ahead.

suggestedAnswer.text: The road ahead winds with a series of turns or curves.

comment.text: The road ahead winds with a series of turns or curves.
Slippery when wet.
Slippery when wet.

answerExplanation.text: Warning signs provide notice to road users of a situation that might not be readily apparent and are usually yellow with black markings. This sign warns drivers to be careful when driving under wet conditions as the pavement will become slippery and more difficult to navigate safely.

comment.text: This road sign means: | Warning signs provide notice to road users of a situation that might not be readily apparent and are usually yellow with black markings. This sign warns drivers to be careful when driving under wet conditions as the pavement will become slippery and more difficult to navigate safely.

hasPart.name: This sign means:
hasPart.assesses: This sign means: | This sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A five-sided yellow or yellow-green sign alerts drivers to either a school zone or school crossing.

comment.text: School zone or crossing.
Pedestrian crossing.
Railroad ahead.
School zone or crossing.

answerExplanation.text: A five-sided yellow or yellow-green sign alerts drivers to either a school zone or school crossing.

comment.text: This sign means: | A five-sided yellow or yellow-green sign alerts drivers to either a school zone or school crossing.

hasPart.name: The proper way to make a right turn is to:

about.name: The proper way to make a right turn is to:

hasPart.assesses: The proper way to make a right turn is to: | The proper way to make a right turn is to: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Before beginning a right turn, use the appropriate signal to give surrounding drivers adequate notice of your intentions. Slow down and approach the intersection from the right lane, staying as close as is practical to the right curb or edge of the roadway.

suggestedAnswer.text: Signal, slow down, and get into the lane closest to the centerline before turning.

comment.text: Signal, slow down, and get into the lane closest to the centerline before turning.

suggestedAnswer.text: Signal, slow down, and get into the lane closest to the right curb before turning.

comment.text: Signal, slow down, and get into the lane closest to the right curb before turning.

suggestedAnswer.text: Approach the corner in the lane nearest the right curb, but move over toward the middle of the street before turning.

comment.text: Approach the corner in the lane nearest the right curb, but move over toward the middle of the street before turning.

acceptedAnswer.text: Signal, slow down, and get into the lane closest to the right curb before turning.

comment.text: Signal, slow down, and get into the lane closest to the right curb before turning.

answerExplanation.text: Before beginning a right turn, use the appropriate signal to give surrounding drivers adequate notice of your intentions. Slow down and approach the intersection from the right lane, staying as close as is practical to the right curb or edge of the roadway.

comment.text: The proper way to make a right turn is to: | Before beginning a right turn, use the appropriate signal to give surrounding drivers adequate notice of your intentions. Slow down and approach the intersection from the right lane, staying as close as is practical to the right curb or edge of the roadway.

hasPart.name: If you find that the roadway ahead of you is flooded, you should:

about.name: If you find that the roadway ahead of you is flooded, you should:

hasPart.assesses: If you find that the roadway ahead of you is flooded, you should: | If you find that the roadway ahead of you is flooded, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Never attempt to drive on a flooded road. Even if the water looks shallow, it may hide many kinds of hazards. If you encounter a flooded area, turn around and seek another route to your destination.

comment.text: Slam on the brakes.

suggestedAnswer.text: Not drive through the flooded area. Turn around and find another route.

comment.text: Not drive through the flooded area. Turn around and find another route.

suggestedAnswer.text: Drive only in the center of the roadway.

comment.text: Drive only in the center of the roadway.

acceptedAnswer.text: Not drive through the flooded area. Turn around and find another route.

comment.text: Not drive through the flooded area. Turn around and find another route.

answerExplanation.text: Never attempt to drive on a flooded road. Even if the water looks shallow, it may hide many kinds of hazards. If you encounter a flooded area, turn around and seek another route to your destination.

comment.text: If you find that the roadway ahead of you is flooded, you should: | Never attempt to drive on a flooded road. Even if the water looks shallow, it may hide many kinds of hazards. If you encounter a flooded area, turn around and seek another route to your destination.

hasPart.name: A peace officer is signaling for you to drive to the edge of the roadway. You decide to ignore the officer's warning and flee the scene. You are guilty of a misdemeanor and can be punished by being:

hasPart.text: Any person, while operating a motor vehicle, who willfully flees or attempts to evade a peace officer performing his or her duties is guilty of a misdemeanor punishable by imprisonment in a county jail for not more than one year.

comment.text: Fined up to $1,000.

suggestedAnswer.text: Jailed in the county jail for not more than one year.

comment.text: Jailed in the county jail for not more than one year.

suggestedAnswer.text: Given a warning and a citation.

comment.text: Given a warning and a citation.

acceptedAnswer.text: Jailed in the county jail for not more than one year.

comment.text: Jailed in the county jail for not more than one year.

answerExplanation.text: Any person, while operating a motor vehicle, who willfully flees or attempts to evade a peace officer performing his or her duties is guilty of a misdemeanor punishable by imprisonment in a county jail for not more than one year.

comment.text: A peace officer is signaling for you to drive to the edge of the roadway. You decide to ignore the officer's warning and flee the scene. You are guilty of a misdemeanor and can be punished by being: | Any person, while operating a motor vehicle, who willfully flees or attempts to evade a peace officer performing his or her duties is guilty of a misdemeanor punishable by imprisonment in a county jail for not more than one year.
